---
title: Supplementary material for the `bbob-biobj` and `bbob-biobj-ext` test suites  #
---

Welcome to the website with supplementary material for the `bbob-biobj` and `bbob-biobj-ext` test suites from 
the [COCO](https://github.com/numbbo/coco) (Comparing Continuous Optimizers) platform [@Hansen2021coco]. 

It provides [function definitions](def.qmd) and [visualizations](vis.qmd) for all 92 `bbob-biobj-ext` problems 
introduced in the [paper](https://direct.mit.edu/evco/article-pdf/30/2/165/2025995/evco_a_00298.pdf) <strong>Using Well-Understood Single-Objective Functions in Multiobjective Black-Box 
Optimization Test Suites</strong> by Dimo Brockhoff, Anne Auger, Nikolaus Hansen and Tea Tušar published in the 
<cite>Evolutionary Computation Journal</cite> [@Brockhoff2022]. It also shows the [empirical distribution of angles](ecdfs.qmd) 
between the two (estimated) gradients at the best known Pareto set approximations in low dimensions. The 
[postprossed data page](ppdata.qmd) shows the postprocessed results from a comparison among three selected algorithms.
